website_summaries.verdict: Great price point for a universal lug wrench with a high level of construction quality.
pros: Will work with all kinds of tires on vehicles
Handles are coated in a material that gives you a great grip, so it's easier to use
Has a nice heft to it, and it feels solidly built
Chrome plating in the lug wrench will keep it from rusting
Works with four different lug nut sizes, ranging from eleven-sixteenths to seven-eighths of an inch (roughly 17 to 22 millimeters)
Popular lug wrench because of its reasonable price
cons: May not fit lug nuts for all vehicles

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, but Be Careful
customer_reviews.text: The four socket sizes are posted as both US and metric sizes. DON'T be fooled by this. They are actually US sized sockets that list metric sizes as approximations. I tried to use this product on my BMW with 17 MM lugs and lug socket did not fit snugly. This, coupled with my mechanic over-torquing the lug nuts, resulted in both a stripped lug and a stripped lug socket, not to mention a long and very frustrating Saturday night in the cold with a flat tire.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Rega

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Needed to rotate my tires and lost my stock tire iron, so purchased this one. Within minutes of opening the package I went to pull my tires off. Didn't realize this had multiple sizes, bonus! The non slip grip made it super friendly on the hands. Didn't have to break by foot like usual. Would definitely recommend to a friend, or fellow Amazon Warrior.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Lanier

customer_reviews.title: Works but leaves marks on lugs
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended but obviously cheaply made. The chrome plating is chipping on mine after doing a single tire rotation and it left a few marks on my lug nuts too. Great as an emergency wrench to keep in your trunk since anyone who has ever had to use the factory kit provided with most vehicles knows how awful they are to use (especially on the side of a busy highway, at night). If you plan to use it a lot, I'd get a better one. The tolerances seem a bit looser than my Ken-Tool, which is probably the cause of the lug marring, but it's also 3-4 times the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pitstop

customer_reviews.title: Be careful to check lug fit first.........too much play
customer_reviews.text: Have this in the back in case of emergencies, but first time using realized that the 19mm size is not truly 19mm. It has a lot more play than a 19mm socket, so I won’t be using it except emergencies. I think each side is sized to fit SAE and metric so there is play for all lug nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Rainy

customer_reviews.title: This product is not made strong enough
customer_reviews.text: I used it in my first flat tire today and it bent 60 degrees and the socket to hold the bold cracked open .... I was stuck for 5 hours
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Feels great in the hand. Good weight and sturdy. Sizes seem exact and it is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Altman

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: At it's price-point, I am fairly certain that this is the best 16" lug cross on the market. It fits nice and snug over my lugs, the grips spin smoothly in my hands but provide some nice padding. The size is perfect for my spare well. I admit I was a skeptic because of the low price, but Cartman made me a believer. Solid.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Kraus

customer_reviews.title: Saved the day!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of this 4way lug wrench. I was driving one day and saw a truck on the side of the road with a flat. As I drove down the road I recognized the guy walking. I stopped and offered him a ride. I asked what the problem with changing the tire? He said, got no lug wrench. We turned around and put the wrench into action. He was gonna order one from Amazon when he got home. Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Battenfield

customer_reviews.title: Very nice to use on stubborn lug nuts
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this because my car's tool did not seem strong enough to get the wheels off my car for a tire rotation. I went through the process of buying this tool and then a breaker bar before realizing that I kept trying to loosen the nuts with the car in the air and not on the ground. Of all the tools that I now have for lug nuts, this is by far my favorite because it is more comfortable to use and easy to quickly spin off the lug nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Hol A

customer_reviews.title: Good short Cross Wrench
customer_reviews.text: Good short Cross Wrench at 16" instead of 14" Fit perfectly under the Subaru Forester storage under floor lid. Heavy for its size and feels that it is going to hold up for the long term. It is much easier to use to use a cross wrench since both hands are used to remove nuts straight one instead of a downward angle. If I have a truck I may use a 20" cross wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize this when I bought it but this thing is small. I'd had one before and it was awesome. This one feels like a toy in comparison. Listen to the other reviews on this point. Buy something bigger and more solidly built.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Nesbitt

customer_reviews.title: This is a 4way lug Wrench and it does the job.
customer_reviews.text: This is a 4way lug Wrench and it does the job. I only have used it twice but one of the times I had to stand on it to get a nut loose and it did not bend. The Rubber grips are not soft but I do not think that was the point of them. They do make the wrench easier to use since its slightly larger around than the standard plain metal.
customer_reviews.author: John bowman

customer_reviews.title: Loose Fit
customer_reviews.text: I use this cross wrench on my trailer wheels. When it arrived, the first thing I did was go to my trailer and see how it fit ... poorly. The 13/16" is very loose and feels like it would ruin the wheel lugs. I've also seen other posters with the same complaint. I should have listened.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It fits my daughters car to replace the one she was missing. Seems sturdy when applying pressure to remove lug nuts. The bars are more comfortable to use than a regular all metal one. And with the X shape you can spin lug nuts on and on quickly
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy lug wrench
customer_reviews.text: Convinced the tire shop put different size lug nuts on my car so this does the job of fitting the various sizes. Do not feel it slips like other reviews. Sturdy so if you need to stand on it to loosen nuts it will hold up. Easy to use. A little harder to store in modern trunks.
customer_reviews.author: From the 808

customer_reviews.title: Great value & reliable
customer_reviews.text: Recently used the 19mm to remove tire on 2005 Toyota Camry due to a bad valve stem. Non-slip grips were nice, plus had no problems of slippage/stripping. This is definitely staying in the trunk. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and appears to be sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to replace the hollow Ford lug wrench on my Mustang GT that bent horribly trying to change a flat tire.. It works like a charm and fits nicely in the trunk! Recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool to have!
customer_reviews.text: I took a picture on a album cover so you can see the size. Great product great price!
customer_reviews.author: Life2short

customer_reviews.title: Good material
customer_reviews.text: I loved it I had the change the shocks on the back tire today it was raining lot and I love the fact It had the rubber On it so you had more grip as you turn I can definitely tell you it's a good product and it definitely works in the rain
customer_reviews.author: ali Khan

customer_reviews.title: STURDY PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: The product looked sturdy, but I found out that I didn’t need it. So, I returned it!! CUDDO’S for Amazon!’ As when I dropped it off to the return center, I got an immediate refund, as it showed in transit!!
customer_reviews.author: SOCKS3914

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: Love the grip, came brand new as the it was wrapped with plastic. The grips feel good and actually can't wait to break it in. Great star.
customer_reviews.author: Mauro

customer_reviews.title: Just a tad short
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product, feels good and sturdy, the only bad is it too short for me to be able to get a good grip to tighten or loosen lug nuts
customer_reviews.author: SilveradoIDrive

customer_reviews.title: A good value
customer_reviews.text: I have used this tool only once, but it worked well. (NOTE: Anti-slip does not mean it cannot slip if you do not seat it well.) I have 3 different cars where this tool should work on all 3. As for durability, my one-time use does give me enough experience to judge that.
customer_reviews.author: C.R. Mayhew

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy tool.
customer_reviews.text: We gave our tire iron to our grandson because he didn’t have one. Our old one was over 40 years old, we were afraid a new one wouldn’t be as good but the Cartman is a great replacement, sturdy and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: j.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Well Built Tire Tool,
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for replacement tire-tool for BMW, This unit is very well Built Strong and No Twisting when removing heavy torqued bolts. Excellent Grip no Slip webbing.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Murray

customer_reviews.title: The best you can buy !!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that it is short enough to get the lower lugs off my boat trailer wheels without having to take it off and put it back on. It’s the best lug wrench I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Harlan H. mote

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: 16" is smaller than the ones i've used in the past, came as a surprise how small it was when i opened it, but that should help prevent over-torqueing the lugs, and it works, so i like it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: It appears to be a good quality item....
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the product, it seems very sturdy and l really like the hand grips. I can't make any statements regarding the use of the wrench as I haven't had the necessity to use it as yet.
customer_reviews.author: BLB  Hobe Sound

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Wranch
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one for my parents, but after I saw it I wanted one for my self as it was much better then I expected. Unfortunately for me they were sold-out when I went back to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Teck K

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used it yet but seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this yet but it seems like a sturdy one piece instead of those ones that are really 2 pieces welded together. This one looks like a nice sturdy once piece unit.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lug Wrench but smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid a little more attention to the size of this. It is smaller than most lug wrench stars which means you will have less leverage when trying to break your lug nuts loose. The items seems very well built and comes exactly as advertised. Will fit in a smaller toolbox due to its smaller footprint. Aside from size it seems to be a well built tool
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It is nice to have different sizes in one tool, specially when is well made. I have (for reasons) different lugbolt sizes in my car wheels. Fits all of them
customer_reviews.author: Henrique Ellrich

customer_reviews.title: Better than I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully I won’t need to use this, but if I do, it’s heavier than I anticipated. Feels great! My husband was impressed, so that’s great
customer_reviews.author: Andra Myers

customer_reviews.title: Get these and replace the tiny one that came with the car.
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these after the last time I couldn't remove the lug nuts with the silly tiny one that come with the car. With these in your car, they will actually prevent flats via karma.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Great lug wrench
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the crappy lug wrench that came with my car. This is much better and gives me much more torque for removing lug nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Dub Gee

customer_reviews.title: IT FITS!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and fits multiple sizes perfectly. I recommend this product. I just got it, so am uncertain of its longevity, but its good for now. If something happens or i find it sucks, i will definitely adjust this review.
customer_reviews.author: Maui Rater

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This lug wrench beats having to use the knuckle-buster that typically comes with the car or truck. I liked it so much, I bought one for each vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: LOUIS A DANIELS

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 16 year old daughter. She has a 2001 Isuzu Rodeo Sport 4WD that we purchased used and the jack handle and wrench were missing. Haven't had to use it yet but it appears to be solid, perfect for (hopefully) small amount of usage it will see.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa’s

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a Jeep for our daughter and it did not have a wrench at all & of course she was on the road & got a flat tire. Thank goodness someone stopped to help & had one that fit her tire. We got this immediately & she hasn't had to use it, but it fits nicely & easier to turn.
customer_reviews.author: barbclay

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit very well, ended up stripping my bolts, had to get another one from OReilly auto parts
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit very well, ended up stripping my bolts, had to get another one from OReilly auto parts.
customer_reviews.author: B. George

customer_reviews.title: It's a great value
customer_reviews.text: I recently had to replace the brakes on my girlfriend's car, and purchased this 4-way so I could use it on both my truck, and her car. The tool is sturdy, and compact, and the rubber grips are helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jason McMillen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product !! Mechanic endorsed !!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. So much better than the factory model that came with my SUV. You get great grip and plenty of torque. Even my mechanic said this was a really nice tire iron 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Oliver A. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great wrench ... excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of the lug wrench that came with my truck, so saw this and figured, why not. I have used star wrenched before and at first thought I wouldn't care if the handle was padded or not.... guess what, I am now a believer! I highly recommend this wrench. It is smalle than most, so it gets tucked away easier, and the padded handles are now something that I require!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: literally useful
customer_reviews.text: the handles give it a good grip and am glad that i don't have to worry much for finding the right wrench since it brings different sizes, was able to help out my mom and neighbor with replacing a popped tire they each had on their car. very useful tool to carry around and truly recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky

customer_reviews.title: spare for different sizes.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet to change any tires but it fits all the lug sizes i needed to fit without using another tool. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: SHAMUS J.

customer_reviews.title: Lug wrench
customer_reviews.text: The lug wrench was delivered on time and worked as advertised. It is well constructed and easy to use. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Walker Staerker

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and awesome durability
customer_reviews.text: Just want to say that metric and American measurements are not the same
customer_reviews.author: Purplepanther

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Had to help two friends change tires as soon as I got it. Makes unscrewing bolts quick and easy because you can spin them off when loose. Great tool
customer_reviews.author: James williams

customer_reviews.title: Super if you have multiple cars.
customer_reviews.text: I like this because with 4 different cars I wanted a GOOD lug wrench for all. The handle pads are sturdy and really like the feel of wrench. I would buy again 100% Also the price is good.
customer_reviews.author: James Wohler

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and great to add to my arsenal for my emergency kit. I love the rubber grips and the weight. Overall, very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Niko Farron

customer_reviews.title: Best choice
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best I've ever used. I specifically like the rubber coating because it stays put in the hand while spinning the wrench. Definitely 5*****
customer_reviews.author: Ynot

customer_reviews.title: 4 differnet size nuts
customer_reviews.text: Used in on my ATV to remove tire, used it on my Jetski trailer, used it on spare tire holder. Good gripping , also slightly longet than those 14 inch ones for better control. Good value good quality. Would suggest others to buy
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Steele

customer_reviews.title: which is a good thing, as who needs another flat tire
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the chance to use it yet, which is a good thing, as who needs another flat tire. I purchase this because the lug wrench included with my vehicle was barely adequate & this one intrigued me due to the anti-slip handles. Upon 1st inspection, it appears to be of very sturdy construction & much easier to use, which I hope never happens. I hate changing tires.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J Carlson

customer_reviews.title: STURDY
customer_reviews.text: Love the different sizes available on one lug wrench. The price was reasonable and it's sturdy. Works great, so no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and faster way
customer_reviews.text: Really good with lose tire lug nuts not but really good with stubborn or tight lug nuts. I used the standard single arm wrench to loosen them up and then used this to pull them off faster.
customer_reviews.author: Ati

customer_reviews.title: Super leverage
customer_reviews.text: I had not had the chance to use it As yet but hope it will not be soon. If and when I do. There is not doubt it will be up to the task.
customer_reviews.author: Richard T

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy but check your wheels first.
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a very high quality product but my wheels are such that the extra-thick socket of this wrench will not reach my lug nuts. I rate the item highly and will probably give it to a friend but check your wheels before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Real strong, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought an old travel trailer and my impact driver could not break the tire lugs loose. Bought & used my new Cross Wrench worked GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I really like the anti slip. Best part of product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It really doesn't get better than this for this price. This lug nut wrench will fit your vehicle and be a help of you need to help someone else with a flat. Also, having the four stems helps a lot with leverage when you're trying to get off a tight lug nut.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Foisy

customer_reviews.title: A really good lug wrench.
customer_reviews.text: You don't really think of a lug wrench as cool and high fashion, normally, but this one is, and it's ergonomic (grips that are easy on the hands). It's just too cool.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: High quality and strong
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality product, very heavy though, the weight makes it slightly more complicated to use, but it is study and won't break on you.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet but appears to be a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: keb

customer_reviews.title: Better than a regular lug wrench
customer_reviews.text: Used it, works pretty good. Bought for my sons Jeep Liberty. The compact size is great for storing under the seat, not so good for leverage on stubborn lug nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable grip and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love the grip on the handles. They are really comfortable on the hands and are really easy to grip and pull. Older lug wrenches I used in the past had no grip and the smooth metal made it easy to slip. This lug wrench is very sturdy and did a great job for me.
customer_reviews.author: David Atwood

customer_reviews.title: Does What It’s Supposed To
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it’s supposed to. Pretty much a standard tire iron, but with a little more comfort and grip thanks to the plastic grips.
customer_reviews.author: JClay

customer_reviews.title: Have to give 5
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it but it seems very sturdy and strong. I have to give five stars since I have not tested it yet. Once I put it to work I will review it properly.
customer_reviews.author: Royce Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and seems well made. The grip is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I keep it in my car for emergencies but use it for plenty of projects. So pleased with how well it does, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: kaitlin anne nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid tool for the price. A must have in the trunk. Tire tools in the car’s jack set are trash. Only down side it does not return when thrown as shape suggests.
customer_reviews.author: A real person

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Very good quality and is very sturdy. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce K. Chatterton

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid lug wrench
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than expected, but that is my fault. I should have used a tape measure to see exactly what 16" looks like. :) But it is a nice solid lug wrench and I expect it to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Zeta Minor

customer_reviews.title: Compact but effective.
customer_reviews.text: It’s small and compact but still effective enough to change a tire. I prefer 4-ways better than the cheap factory wrenches. Fits perfect under the back deck lid.
customer_reviews.author: DWC

customer_reviews.title: TOUGH
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty...no problem using this one with a cheater bar.
customer_reviews.author: Ed W. Schuler

customer_reviews.title: Not 17mm
customer_reviews.text: Not 17mm! Do not buy if you're looking for 17mm. It will work BUT it's very loose and has a ton of play. You will strip the wrench, strip the lug nut, or damage your wheel because the iron will slip off the nut.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C Lorincz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The rubber grip makes it easier to use and you don't have to touch bare metal in colder temps.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rockwell

customer_reviews.title: Love the nonslip grips
customer_reviews.text: With the nonslip grip it doesn't get hot if you lay it in the sun! Great for days when it's HOT and you're rotating tires.
customer_reviews.author: Surfer451

customer_reviews.title: Very good lug wrench
customer_reviews.text: Very good lug wrench. I got the anti-slip one thinking the blue part would be more spongy like or gel like but it is a hard plastic. So it really does not help in the anti-slip it advertises. But it is a great wrench for the money.
customer_reviews.author: VTSnoop

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!
customer_reviews.text: 5 star all the way!! Everyone should have this in their car!!
customer_reviews.author: Shadow Aero Man

customer_reviews.title: Love the grip
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband. He loves it very sturdy and like the way it has grip on the ends and great replacement for the old basic one
customer_reviews.author: Victoria H

customer_reviews.title: Should Do The Job
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for grandson; should do the job. Liked the feel and weight. Hopefully he won't have to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Preum

customer_reviews.title: Try it out, you might like it.
customer_reviews.text: I like this lug wrench and I like the hand padding.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery.  Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works well on my trailer and car. Good to have several sizes on one tool. The soft handles are a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: T. Thordarson

customer_reviews.title: Beats fighting with lug nuts
customer_reviews.text: Got this so my kid wouldn't have to struggle with frozen lug nuts.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Good material
customer_reviews.text: What would you expect it from then you’ll find it
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great Wrench!
customer_reviews.text: This wench has a brilliant finish with padded pressure points. It's heavy but slightly smaller than the lug wrench your granddaddy used. Great addition to any tool collection.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Worthy
customer_reviews.text: The grips are more like a plastic then rubber but it still is a good value.

customer_reviews.title: As described.
customer_reviews.text: Got a Jeep Wrangler and it didnt have the Lug wrench. Got this one and it matches the color of the Jeep!
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Very strong
customer_reviews.text: Strong cross wrench (broke my last), the added blue plastic gets you more grip. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Seb

customer_reviews.title: This item came early and is great. It's very durable I stood on it and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in a pinch because I needed to bleed my brakes but did not have one of these. This item came early and is great. It's very durable I stood on it and it held it don't break or even show any give. The only problem that I have with this is the grip isn't what I expected I thought it was a softer grip and not a hard plastic grip. Thank you very much for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley yoakam

customer_reviews.title: Nice color wrench
customer_reviews.text: I Love it, first time I have a colored tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer . Mario G.

customer_reviews.title: Solid tool
customer_reviews.text: Does what it does and a pretty good job too.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty tool, I wasn’t expecting it to be such good quality for the price. I’m very happy with my purchase and would buy again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great tool.
customer_reviews.text: What's good about this product is the padded bars or handles. Not sure what to call them.
customer_reviews.author: IDA G. SNAIDMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great value, as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This style allows bolt removal without pushing car in one direction. (Still should break bolt tension when car is on ground) The wheel bolts were changed on son's car, so his tire iron no longer worked.
customer_reviews.author: TN Spartan

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, a bit on the small side.
customer_reviews.text: I think this would be best for keeping in the car for an emergency. I would rather have one slightly larger to keep in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great to have in every car for that just n case.
customer_reviews.text: Always great to have this n every car. The hubby hasn't used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L. Price

customer_reviews.title: I'll give this 6 stars just for how good I think it will be
customer_reviews.text: I'll give this 6 stars just for how good I think it will be. Heavy enough to double as a tool or weapon if someone tries to rob you while you're fixing your flat.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan S. Guymon

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs one
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should have a cross wrench in their car, and this is a good one!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Best tire iron I ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Quality tire iron! Heavy duty but still not too heavy to lug around. Runs circles around and other I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Dasol Won

product_meta.title: CARTMAN 16" Universal Anti-Slip Cross Wrench, Lug Wrench
feature_bullets: Extra protection centers for extra strength
America's premier professional lug wrench for cars, light trucks, SUVs, RVs and vans
